name: Stock Car Racing Simulator 21
description:
Have you ever wanted to experience the same adrenaline rush as a professional Stock Car Racing driver? Professional oval track racing that explodes with stock car racing action!


CAREER MODE:
BUILD YOUR OWN EMPIRE
Stock Car Racing isn’t just about winning a race; building a successful franchise is just as important. How you build your Garage will directly affect your popularity, ability to upgrade cars, and competitiveness on the track. Think wisely before recklessly constructing your Racing Team!

CARS:
Find a Sponsor for your team and build up your stock car.

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your car on the absolute limit of adhesion around 1 to 4 mile banked oval tracks. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.


MULTIPLE TRACKS
20 Real tracks from a 1 mile short oval to a 4 mile super speedway.

1- Daytona International Speedway
2- Home-Stead Miami Speedway
3-Autoclub Speedway
4- Chicagoland Speedway
5- Atlanta Motor Speedway

13-Charlotte Speedway
14- Iowa Speedway
15- Texas Motor Speedway
16- Nashville SuperSpeedway
17- Pocono Raceway
18- New Hamshire Speedway
19- Phoenizx Speedway
20- Indiana Polis Motor Speedway

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Simulated car-damage with sparks and smoke for a more realistic racing experience.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours, hood decals and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
You and your vehicle will need to adapt and upgrade as you race across America. Your garage will help you prepare for your next battle. Select the most suitable upgrades for your next race to ensure a quick and easy victory!

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics. Complete full season of racing and becme a champion.


EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.
